text: وَإِمَّا يَنزَغَنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ نَزۡغٞ فَٱسۡتَعِذۡ بِٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

translation.en: And if an evil suggestion comes to you from Satan, then seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He is Hearing and Knowing
translation.id: (Dan jika setan datang menggodamu, maka berlindunglah kepada Allah354) Sungguh, Dia Maha Mendengar, Maha Mengetahui
